mapper.select: select rownum row_n, c.commem, m.memname, c.comsum from (select commem, sum(comamount) comsum from commission where to_char(comdate,'yyyy-mm')=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy-mm') GROUP BY commem order by comsum desc) c, member m where c.commem=m.memnum and rownum <= 5

select rownum, res.* from (select m.memname smemname,s.smem, s.scnt from (select count(*) scnt, smem from sns where to_char(sdate,'yyyy-mm')=to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyy-mm') group by smem) s, member m where s.smem = m.memnum order by s.scnt desc) res where rownum <= 5

select rownum, d.dename, d.denum, t.tcnt from (select count(*) tcnt, todept from todo where toconfirm='o' and to_char(TOSTDATE,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') group by todept order by tcnt desc) t, (select * from dept where denum!=999) d where d.denum=t.todept(+) and rownum <= 5
select m.memname, t.tcnt from (select tomem, count(*) tcnt from (select * from todo where todept=#{deptnum}) group by tomem) t, member m where t.tomem=m.memnum

select rownum, p.product, p.procount, m.memname from (select * from product where to_char(startdate,'yyyy-mm')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') or to_char(enddate,'yyyy-mm')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') order by procount desc) p, member m where p.prowriter=m.memnum and rownum <= 5
